Humans could produce their own food and energy, eliminating the need for agriculture and reducing their carbon footprint.
Humans could potentially harness the power of photosynthesis to create biofuels and other renewable energy sources.
Humans could create a new industry around photosynthesis-based products, such as plant-based plastics and materials.
Humans could use photosynthesis to clean up pollutants and waste from the environment.
Humans could use photosynthesis to create new medical treatments and cures for diseases.
